# GEMIPM2K v. 0.725
# Prototype 12.07.2006
# Comments can be marked with #

# Template for the dbr-dat text input file for DATABR data
# (should be read only after the DATACH and the IPM-DAT files)

#'sCon' Node handle and status code
# Node identification handle
<NodeHandle>     0
# Node type (hydraulic); see typedef NODETYPE
<NodeTypeHY>     0
# Node type (mass transport); see typedef NODETYPE
<NodeTypeMT>     0
# Node status code FMT; see typedef NODECODEFMT
<NodeStatusFMT>  1
# Node status code CH;  see typedef NODECODECH
<NodeStatusCH>   1
# Number of iterations performed by IPM
<IterDone>       34

##'dCon' Chemical scalar variables
# Temperature T, K
<T>    298.15
# Pressure P, bar
<P>    1
# Volume V of reactive subsystem, cm3
<Vs>   999.944
# Volume of inert subsystem, cm3
<Vi>   0
# Mass of reactive subsystem,  g 
<Ms>   0.997033
# Mass of inert subsystem, g
<Mi>   0
# Gibbs energy of reactive subsystem, J
<Gs>   -5295.11
# Enthalpy of reactive subsystem, J 
<Hs>   0
# Enthalpy of inert subsystem, J  
<Hi>   0
# Effective aqueous ionic strength, molal
<IS>   0.000385368
# pH of aqueous solution 
<pH>   9.90998
# pe of aqueous solution
<pe>   10.3367
# Eh of aqueous solution, V
<Eh>   1

## FMT scalar variables (used only on the level of NodeArray)
# actual total simulation time, s
<Tm>   0
# actual time step
<dt>   0
# General diffusivity of disolved matter in the mode
<Dif>  0
# total volume of the node (voxel), m3
<Vt>   0
# advection velocity (in pores) in this node
<vp>   0
#  effective (actual) porosity normalized to 1
<eps>  0
# actual permeability, m2
<Km>   0
# actual DARCY`s constant, m2/s
<Kf>   0
# specific storage coefficient, dimensionless
<S>    0
# transmissivity m2/s
<Tr>   0
# actual hydraulic head (hydraulic potential), m
<h>    0
# actual carrier density for density-driven flow, g/cm3
<rho>  0
# specific longitudinal dispersivity of porous media, m
<al>   0
# specific transversal dispersivity of porous media, m
<at>   0
# specific vertical dispersivity of porous media, m
<av>   0
# hydraulic longitudinal dispersivity, m2/s, diffusities from chemical database
<hDl>  0
# hydraulic transversal dispersivity, m2/s
<hDt>  0
# hydraulic vertical dispersivity, m2/s
<hDv>  0
# tortuosity factor
<nto>  0

### Arrays - for dimensions and index lists, see Section (2) of DATACH file

# Bulk composition (partial) of the system - GEM input (moles)
<bIC>
